name: 杜敏誠
objective:
環境科學為一跨領域之專業，內容涵蓋大氣科學，地球科學，環境化學，與生態學等。由於本系另有專門課程介紹環境生態學，故本課程將主要著重於生態範疇之外的環境科學。本學期之重點有1)人口壓力，農業，與汙染2)人類使用之各種能源對環境之影響3)水資源與水汙染4)大氣圈與空氣汙染5)資源管理6)環境經濟評估。在完成此課程後，學生應能對各類環境問題有一概略的認識，並能開始對如何減少人類在地球上的汙染足跡盡一份心力。
Environmental Science is an interdisciplinary field, covering atmospheric science, Earth science, environmental chemistry, and ecology. Since the department already has a dedicated “environmental ecology” course, this course will focus on topics other than ecology. The topics of this semester include 1) population pressure, agriculture, and pollution 2) the impact of energy use by humans on the environment 3) water resources and pollution 4) atmospheric sphere and air pollution 5) material management 6) economics of environmental issues. After completion of this course, students should be able to have a general understanding of all topics in environmental science, and hopefully, start to contribute to the efforts that reduce our pollution footprints on the planet.

The class will be taught by the combination of traditional lecturing, short movies, in-class discussions, team projects, and team oral presentations. In-class discussion will be the basis to add/subtract the final grade, so please be prepared to participate in the discussions. The written language of the course will be mainly English. All lecturing and conversation will be a mixture of English and Mandarin.

25%　　Final oral report (5% Slide design，10% Details of contents，10%Presentation skills)
